name: Out Of My Time
description:
READ THE PAGE, SO YOU'RE SURE THAT YOU DON'T MISS ANYTHING

In "Out Of My Time" you play as a knight who is stuck in the future, your goal is to find the 3 key cards and get to the other time machine to get back to your time.

this game was made for "The Completion Jam" the theme was "Out Of Place"

I know it's not obvious why the game fits the theme, so let me explain, YOU'RE A KNIGHT IN THE FUTURE! HOW MORE OUT OF PLACE CAN SOMETHING BE!

sorry about that.

there are interactible "stations" spread across the world, they slowly tell you a strory, try to find all 8 of them.

this game is exploration based, i hope you will have fun exploring the world i created.

tips:

you can destroy bullets/laser by attacking them

tapping the jump button makes you jump lower (depends on how long you pressed ot for)

checkpoints restore your health to full no matter what, so if you need health, try to find a checkpoint

controls:

WASD controls:

A & D to move

space to jump

left mouse button to attack

right mouse button to special attack (once able)

W and left mouse button to attack upwards

space or enter to skip/continue text

R to reset to your last checkpoint

ARROW controls:

left & right arrows to move

X to jump

Z to attack

C to special attack (once able)

up arrow and Z to attack upwards

space or enter to skip/continue text

R to reset to your last checkpoint
